dk.bigherman.aero
Class Airfield

java.lang.Object
  dk.bigherman.aero.Airfield

public class Airfield
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a Class to manage Airfield information, including weather. Inlcudes positional information and methods for manipulating it.

Nested Class Summary
static class Airfield.ColourStates
          An enumerated type allowing programmers to work with actual weather colour state names

Airfield

public Airfield(java.lang.String icaoCode,
                java.sql.Connection dbConn)
         throws java.sql.SQLException
Initializes an airfield instance, by reference to an ICAO code.

Parameters:
icaoCode - - the ICAO code of the airfield to be generated
dbConn - - a connection the the airfield database
Throws:
CreateAirfieldException - when the requested ICAO code cannot be found/used to lookup an entry in the database
java.sql.SQLException
